Properties Based Groups

Common Residues in Alfa Helix (AHR) Represents the common residues in Alfa Helix structures: ALA, CYS, GLN, GLU, HIS, LEU, LYS and MET.
Common Residues in Beta Sheet (BSR) Represents the all common residues in Beta Sheet structure: ILE, PHE, THR, TRP, TYR and VAL.
Common Residues in Reverse Turn (RTR) Represents the all common residues in reverse turn structure: ASN, ASP, GLY, PRO and SER.
Aliphatic Residue (ALR) Represents all aliphatic residues contained in the protein.
Aromatic residues (ARM) Represents all aromatic residues: HIS, PHE, TRP and TYR .
Negative Charged (NCR) Represents the all negative charged residues: ASP and GLU.
Positive Charged (PCR) Represents the all positive charged residues: ARG, HIS and LYS.
Uncharged residues (UCR) Represents the Uncharged (neutral) residues: ASN, CYS, GLN, SER,THR,TYR.
Polar Residues (PLR) Represents the all polar resiudes: ARG, ASN, ASP, CYS, GLN, GLU, HIS, LYS, SER, THR and TYR.
Non Polar Residues (NPR) Represents the all non polar residues: ALA, GLY, ILE, LEU, MET, PHE, PRO, TRP and VAL.
UnFolding residues (UFR) Represents the all unfolding residues: GLY and PRO.

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
